title: About A Love Song
alternative_title: Abauto a Rabu Songu ; アバウト ア ラブソング;
status: Abauto a Rabu Songu ; アバウト ア ラブソング;
description:
Description :
        Band member Hoshina wants to do something with music but struggles to write love songs. Recently, his co-worker at a convenience store and a college student, Seto-kun, has been dazzling with purity and... Healing.

On a day that Seto-kun is sad and drenched in the rain, Hoshina takes him home and spends the night with him. But the next morning, it turns out that Seto-kun is "younger" than he thought he was...!

Hoshina is shaken with regret. Although Hoshina tries to be sincere in his mature and inadequate way, Seto-kun becomes even more in love with him.

A dramatic story of age difference x music!
